title: Has an American border patrol officer been killed by stone-armed attackers?
subtitle: There are still questions about the death of the U.S. Border Patrol Officer Rogelio Martinez in November 2017, but little evidence suggests that he was killed by stone-buried attackers.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A member of the United States Border Patrol was killed by attackers who used rocks near the United States and Mexico borders.
